00024 bool uvm_component::kill() {
00025   if (m_run_handle.valid() && !m_run_handle.terminated()) {
00026     m_run_handle.kill();
00027   }
00028   return true;
00029 }

00031 bool uvm_component::reset() {
00032   if (m_run_handle.valid() && !m_run_handle.terminated()) {
00033     m_run_handle.reset(SC_INCLUDE_DESCENDANTS);
00034   }
00035   return true;
00036 }

00042   return true;

00080 template <typename T>
00081 bool uvm_component::throw_it(T& t) {
00082   if (m_run_handle.valid() && !m_run_handle.terminated()) {
00083     m_run_handle.throw_it(t, SC_INCLUDE_DESCENDANTS);
00084   }
00085   return true;
00086 }
